name: NSServicesMenuRequestor
desc: A set of methods that support interaction with items users can share through a sharing service.

items.name: func readSelection(from: NSPasteboard) -> Bool
items.desc: Reads data from the pasteboard and uses it to replace the current selection.

items.name: func writeSelection(to: NSPasteboard, types: [NSPasteboard.PasteboardType]) -> Bool
items.desc: Writes the current selection to the pasteboard.
